ruby:
# @param {Integer[]} nums
# @return {Void} Do not return anything, modify nums in-place instead.
def move_zeroes(nums)
    length = nums.length
  i=0
  j=0
  if length == 0
    return
  end
  if nums[0]!=0 then
    i = 1
    j = i
  end
  
  while j < length do
    if nums[j]!=0 then
      nums[i]=nums[j]
      i = i + 1
    end
    j = j+1
    
  end
  
  while i < length do
    nums[i]=0
    i = i+1
  end
end
